did.head: Collection Summary

repository.corpname: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

did.unittitle: Earle C. Douglas, Jr. autograph collection
did.abstract: This collection contains the autographs of Jefferson Davis, Judah P. Benjamin, and Steven R. Mallory.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Nothing is known at this time about the collector, Earle C. Douglas, Jr.
Jefferson Davis (1808-1889) was an American politician who served as President of the Confederate States of America from 1861 to 1865 during the Civil War.

Judah P. Benjamin (1811-1884) was an American politician and lawyer who was a citizen of the Confederate States of America. He held three consecutive Cabinet positions in the government of the Confederate States of America, but previously was a member of the Louisiana House of Representatives and a U.S. Senator from Louisiana.

Steven R. Mallory (1813-1873) was an American politician and Secretary of the Navy for the Confederate States of America during the Civil War. Mallory was considered to be one of President Davis' best Cabinet officers.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains the autographs of Jefferson Davis, Judah P. Benjamin, and Steven R. Mallory.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This material is open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Earle C. Douglas, Jr. Autograph Collection must be obtained from the Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: This collection was donated to Fondren Library by the estate of Earle C. Douglas and received on July 31, 1997.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Earle C. Douglas, Jr. Autograph Collection, undated, MS 458 Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library, Rice University.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Stored onsite at the Woodson Research Center.

did.unittitle: Autographs (3) of Confederate States of America Persons (Jefferson Davis, Judah P. Benjamin, Steven R. Mallory)
